mapper.sql: SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id=#{ownerOrgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select:
SELECT t_offline_withdrawal.*,t_alliance.alliance_name as allianceName FROM t_offline_withdrawal left join t_alliance on t_alliance.user_id=t_offline_withdrawal.user_id WHERE 1=1
AND t_offline_withdrawal.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_offline_withdrawal.balance LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.balance},'%')
AND t_offline_withdrawal.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_offline_withdrawal.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_offline_withdrawal.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_offline_withdrawal.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_offline_withdrawal.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_offline_withdrawal.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime)
